titles.title: Oh! Oh! Oh! how good is the Lord,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh! Oh! Oh! how good is the Lord,
Oh! Oh! Oh! how good is the Lord,
Oh! Oh! Oh! how good is the Lord,
I never will forget what He has done for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He gives me salvation, how good is the Lord,
He gives me salvation, how good is the Lord,
He gives me salvation, how good is the Lord,
I never will forget what He has done for me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He gives me His blessings, how good is the Lord
(x3)
I never will forget what He has done for me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He gives me His Spirit, how good is the Lord...
I never will forget what He has done for me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He gives me His healing, how good is the Lord...
I never will forget what He has done for me.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
He gives me His glory, how good is the Lord...
I never will forget what He has done for me.
